H1.text: who plays eowyn in lord of the rings. Liv Tyler

H2.text: who plays eowyn in lord of the rings. Kate Winslet

H3.text: who plays eowyn in lord of the rings. Miranda Otto

A4.text: Miranda Otto was cast as Éowyn in The Lord of the Rings film trilogy after Uma Thurman turned down the role.

A5.text: Miranda Otto reprised her role as Éowyn in The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim in 2024.
